name: Calamity
description:
/////////

HOW TO PLAY:

/////////

The objective is to destroy all crystals. To do this, you must also destroy all space stations. Space stations have a ring around them, if you enter this ring they will start sending ships to slow you down and missiles to destroy you. These ships are STRONGER TOGETHER. You must shoot the station until the crystal's defences are destroyed, while at the same time making sure you are not killed.

- W or Right Click to move forward, let go to automatically brake

- Left Click to shoot

- The ship will follow your mouse

Sorry that this game was not finished, and that some of the mechanics are a bit funny, I ran out of time. 

Enjoy!
